tool_description: Full Whois Lookup API in Json Format
name: WHOIS V12
title: WHOIS V12

api_list.name: Get Full Whois Lookup

required_parameters.name: domain
required_parameters.description: Enter Domain Without http:// or https://

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://whois-v12.p.rapidapi.com/domainwhoisinfo/rapidapi.com"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "whois-v12.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://whois-v12.p.rapidapi.com/domainwhoisinfo/{domain}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "whois-v12.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
